languages.text: "Помочь..." {n}Это слово, кажется, на мгновение вырывает Хейнрикса из транса — он вздрагивает всем телом.{/n} "Да. Я вспомнил. Я пришел сюда... потому что только ты можешь мне помочь. Только ты, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Помочь..." {n}Это слово, кажется, на мгновение вырывает Хейнрикса из транса — он вздрагивает всем телом.{/n} "Да. Я вспомнил. Я пришел сюда... потому что только ты можешь мне помочь. Только ты, {name}".

languages.text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Помочь..." {n}Это слово, кажется, на мгновение вырывает Хейнрикса из транса — он вздрагивает всем телом.{/n} "Да. Я вспомнил. Я пришел сюда... потому что только ты можешь мне помочь. Только ты, {name}".

"Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."

languages.text: “帮我……”{n}这句话似乎让海因里希瞬间从恍惚中清醒过来，他的整个身体都在颤抖。{/n}“是啊，我想起来了。我来这里……是因为只有你能帮我。只有你，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “帮我……”{n}这句话似乎让海因里希瞬间从恍惚中清醒过来，他的整个身体都在颤抖。{/n}“是啊，我想起来了。我来这里……是因为只有你能帮我。只有你，{name}。”

languages.text: «Ayuda...». {n}La palabra parece sacar a Heinrix del trance por un momento y su cuerpo se estremece.{/n} «Sí. Ya recuerdo. He venido aquí... porque solo usted puede ayudarme. Solo usted, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Ayuda...». {n}La palabra parece sacar a Heinrix del trance por un momento y su cuerpo se estremece.{/n} «Sí. Ya recuerdo. He venido aquí... porque solo usted puede ayudarme. Solo usted, {name}».

languages.text: 「助けてくれ…」{n}その言葉に、ハインリックスは一瞬、恍惚の表情を浮かべ…全身を跳ね上げた。{/n}「そうだ、思い出した。俺がここに来たのは…あなただけが俺を助けてくれるからだ。{name}、あなただけが」
languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「助けてくれ…」{n}その言葉に、ハインリックスは一瞬、恍惚の表情を浮かべ…全身を跳ね上げた。{/n}「そうだ、思い出した。俺がここに来たのは…あなただけが俺を助けてくれるからだ。{name}、あなただけが」

languages.text: « M'aider... » {n}Ce simple mot semble faire sortir Heinrix de sa transe un court instant. Il tressaille.{/n} « Oui. Je me souviens. Je suis venu ici... parce que vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez m'aider. Vous {mf|seul|seule}, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « M'aider... » {n}Ce simple mot semble faire sortir Heinrix de sa transe un court instant. Il tressaille.{/n} « Oui. Je me souviens. Je suis venu ici... parce que vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez m'aider. Vous {mf|seul|seule}, {name}. »

languages.text: "Hilfe ..." {n}Das Wort scheint Heinrix einen Moment lang aus seiner Trance zu holen – sein ganzer Körper zuckt zusammen.{/n} "Ja. Ich erinnere mich. Ich bin hierhergekommen, weil nur Ihr mir helfen könnt. Nur Ihr, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Hilfe ..." {n}Das Wort scheint Heinrix einen Moment lang aus seiner Trance zu holen – sein ganzer Körper zuckt zusammen.{/n} "Ja. Ich erinnere mich. Ich bin hierhergekommen, weil nur Ihr mir helfen könnt. Nur Ihr, {name}."

languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, ."

languages.text: "Yardım..." {n}Bu sözcük, bir anlığına da olsa Heinrix'i trans hâlinden çıkarıyor. Tüm bedeni irkiliyor.{/n} "Evet, hatırlıyorum. Buraya geldim çünkü... Bana yalnızca sen yardım edebilirsin. Yalnızca sen {name}."
languages.original_text: "Help..." {n}The word seems to pull Heinrix out of his trance for a moment — his entire body flinches.{/n} "Yes. I remember. I came here... because only you can help me. Only you, {name}."
